name: Two People Simulator
description:
Story Everyone loves a great story... but we don't have one. oR dO wE? Gameplay Two different people control the same "Things". This game depends on social interaction and challenge. While it is easier to end the levels for some, It is not for others. This is the next big party game!

If you are good at the game, try to finish it as soon as possible.

TL; DR 

Friendship Killer.

Controls

Well.... embrace yourself because we have lots of those.

Actually, you should check the options menu in-game where you can see and change all the controls as you want!

How to Play

Just try to have fun, playing is very easy. The hard part is communicating.

Goals

Parkour Levels - Find and reach the green boxes as soon as possible.

Car Driving Levels - Park your car inside the green boxes, that must be easy RiGhT?

Airplane Flying Levels - Go thru all the green circles and then reach the BiG Green Box!
